content: Did you gather any <style=Highlight>fruit</style>, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>? You might want to check the nearby fruit trees...

content: Ah, mo need to climb up there. Just give the tree a shake, and the fruit will fall right out. When you've got enough, bring what you've gathered back, and I'll brew up some tea.

content: Before joining <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style>, I traveled to many places and worked in all sorts of jobs. But somehow... none of them ever really felt like a proper life.

content: I was just sniffing around nearby, and I noticed that there's a bunch of fresh wildgrass growing around here. I wonder what kind of tea I could brew with some...?

content: {A惊讶}Ah, mo need to panic! I'd never make you taste anything weird, hoho~. I was just letting my imagination run wild.

content: Hoho~! While I'm here to help you get settled and look after the planet... {A挠头}But in daily life, I hope you'll bear with me.
